# Contributing to $Li Wiki

Thank you for your interest in contributing to the $Li Wiki! This document provides a quick overview of the contribution process.

## 🌐 Language Support

- [🇺🇸 English](../README.md)
- [🇨🇳 简体中文](../README_zh-CN.md)
- [🇹🇼 繁體中文](../README_zh-TW.md)

## 🚀 Quick Start

### For Experienced Contributors

If you're familiar with GitHub workflows:

1. 🔗 [Fork the Repository](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/fork)
2. 📝 [Open a Pull Request](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/compare)
3. 📋 [View Open Issues](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/issues)

### For New Contributors

Visit our [Contributing Guide](https://www.lidao.wiki/contributing) for:

- Step-by-step instructions
- Security guidelines for contributors in China
- Translation help
- Technical setup guidance

## ⚠️ Important Security Notice

If you're contributing from mainland China:

1. Use a reliable VPN
2. Create an anonymous GitHub account with ProtonMail
3. Follow security guidelines in our [Contributing Guide](https://www.lidao.wiki/contributing)

## 💡 Ways to Contribute

1. **Report Issues**
   - [Report Wrong Information](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/issues/new?assignees=really-need-anonymous&labels=bug,wiki&template=bug_report.yml)
   - [Suggest Structure Improvements](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/issues/new?assignees=really-need-anonymous&labels=enhancement,wiki,structure&template=feature_request_structure.yml)
   - [Request New Content](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/issues/new?assignees=really-need-anonymous&labels=enhancement,wiki,content&template=content_request.yml)
   - [Ask Questions](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/issues/new?assignees=really-need-anonymous&labels=question,wiki&template=question.yml)
   - [Suggest Style Improvements](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/issues/new?assignees=really-need-anonymous&labels=style,wiki&template=style_report.yml)

2. **Join Discussions**
   - [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/li-dao/wiki/discussions)
   - [Telegram Group](https://t.co/5Z1meSkAlZ)

3. **Help with Translations**
   - English (en)
   - Simplified Chinese (zh-CN)
   - Traditional Chinese (zh-TW)

## 📝 Need Help?

Not familiar with GitHub or Markdown? You can still contribute! Contact us via:

- [Telegram](https://t.co/5Z1meSkAlZ)
- [Email](mailto:really.need.anonymous@proton.me)

Feel free to write in any language (e.g., Chinese, English) and format (e.g., Markdown, Word). Our maintainers will guide you through the process.

## 📚 Project Structure

See our [README.md](../README.md#wiki-structure) for the complete wiki structure.

## 🤝 Code of Conduct

Please read our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) before contributing.
